messages.content: Hello, thank you for calling Google Customer Service. My name is Emil. Could I have your name, please?
Nice to meet you, Chloe. How can I assist you today?
I'm disappointed with how little information is available about YouTube's sustainability efforts. Can you tell me what Google is doing to make YouTube more sustainable?

I'm sorry to hear that you feel this way, Chloe. YouTube, as part of Google, works on various initiatives to improve sustainability. This includes efforts to reduce carbon footprints, support renewable energy, and improve energy efficiency in our data centers. Is there any specific information you're looking for?
That’s pretty vague. I would expect more concrete steps or commitments. Other companies are very transparent about their sustainability goals. Why isn’t Google, especially with YouTube being so huge?

I understand your concerns, Chloe. Google has committed to operating carbon-free by 2030, and this includes all of its platforms like YouTube. Additionally, we publish an annual environmental report that outlines specific actions and achievements. Have you had a chance to look at our latest report?
I have looked at it, but it still lacks details specifically about YouTube. For instance, what about the energy consumption of streaming videos? What is being done to offset that?

Streaming videos does consume significant energy, and Google is addressing this through increased efficiency in data centers and investment in renewable energy. For example, our data centers use 50% less energy than the typical data center. We are also continuously working on innovations to improve this. I will pass along your feedback regarding the need for more specific information on YouTube.
I appreciate that, but I hope to see more tangible actions and transparency soon. It's frustrating to feel kept in the dark about such an important issue.
I understand your frustration, Chloe. Thank you for sharing your concerns. It helps us know what our users care about. If you have any other questions or need further assistance, please let me know.
That's it for now. Thank you, Emil.
You're welcome, Chloe. Have a great day!
